so_41508640: (trap 'kill $(jobs -p)' EXIT; sleep 5; echo done ) & pid=$!

so_22777618: #!/bin/sh
/usr/local/bin/wrun 'uptime;ps -elf|grep httpd|wc -l;free -m;mpstat' &
pid=$!
sleep 5
kill $pid 2>/dev/null && echo "Killed command on time out"

#!/bin/sh
set +x
ping -i 1 google.de &
pid=$!
echo $pid
sleep 5
echo $pid
kill $pid 2>/dev/null && echo "Killed command on time out"
